title: ZSS Angul Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 21 Medical Officer Posts
description: Zilla Swasthya Samiti Angul (ZSS Angul) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 21 Medical Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the ZSS Angul Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salarystructure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested can eligible candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you are looking ...
